story.iWant: to send video clips to Google Gemini
story.soThat: users get video-native analysis from Gemini for the highest quality event descriptions

tasks.task: Research Gemini Video API - Verify video input format, file upload vs base64, size/duration limits, model requirements
Implement describe_video() method in GeminiProvider - Add async method, read video file, use genai library, return AIResult
Add video size/duration validation - Implement _validate_video_for_gemini(), check limits from PROVIDER_CAPABILITIES
Implement video format conversion - Add _convert_video_format() using PyAV, support MP4/H.264
Add token/cost tracking for video requests - Extract token usage from response, estimate if needed, calculate cost
Update _try_video_native_analysis() in protect_event_handler - Remove placeholder, call describe_video(), handle fallback
Add AIService orchestration for describe_video - Add method, route to video-capable providers, handle fallback
Write tests - Unit tests for describe_video, validation, format conversion; integration test for video_native

acceptanceCriteria.ac: Given video clip under Gemini limits (20MB, 60s), when AIService.describe_video() called for Gemini, then video sent using Gemini API, description returned
Given video needs format conversion, when original format unsupported, then converts to MP4/H.264 using PyAV, retries
Given Gemini video analysis completes, when response received, then token usage tracked, cost estimate calculated
Given Gemini provider configured with valid API key, when describe_video() called with valid clip, then returns AIResult with description
Given video exceeds Gemini limits (>20MB or >60s), when video analysis attempted, then returns AIResult with success=False, triggers fallback to multi_frame

constraints.constraint: Follow existing GeminiProvider pattern: async methods, AIResult return type, structured logging with extra dict
Use PROVIDER_CAPABILITIES for limits - don't hardcode values in describe_video()
Fallback chain: video_native failures append to self._fallback_chain list
Token/cost estimation pattern from generate_multi_image_description(): tokens_used = 150 + estimate
Video prompt should use MULTI_FRAME_SYSTEM_PROMPT pattern for temporal narrative
Mock genai library responses in tests - don't make real API calls
Test both success and failure paths including validation errors
Video analysis may be slower - use appropriate timeouts (30s suggested)
